argument.description: An expression that specifies the source string.
An expression that specifies the source string.
An expression that specifies the string to be inserted into source-string, starting at the position identified by start.
An expression that specifies the source string.

description: The OVERLAY function returns a string in which, beginning at start in source-string, length of the specified code units have been deleted and insert-string has been inserted.
sample:
SELECT OVERLAY('INSERTING','IS',4,2,OCTETS),
     OVERLAY('INSERTING','IS',4,0,OCTETS),
     OVERLAY('INSERTING','',4,2,OCTETS)
     FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
